name: 陳維昌
objective:
The course aims to provide an introduction to linear system and contains the following topics:

1. Mathematical Descriptions of Systems 
2. Linear Algebra 
3. State-Space Solutions and Realizations 
4. Stability 
5. Controllability and Observability
6. Minimal Realizations and Coprime Fractions
